channel.title: How to?
channel.description:
How can i add Dragon full helemt in my server
How mean:The code and where to put it.
And huh i got Saradomin godsword in my server but i can wear it but when i attack it disppear so i have only have and when it finish the attack i am back with the godsword so how ? (Well it say Item ID dose'nt exist...

item.title: How to?
item.dc:creator: @system system
item.description:
@system wrote:

u have silabs…
uhhhh
its 15195 put it in your item.cfg then put the id in hats in item4.java
for the sara gs
search for

public int GetWepAnim()

and c+p this in

if(playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 15334 || playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 12430 || playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 15336 || playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 15333 || playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 15335) // godsword { return 407; }

the return is the emote it goes with
u can also scroll down and add more for liek walking animation

to get rid of the item doesn’t exist put it in item.cfg

Read full topic
